definition: to sow/to scatter/to spread/to broadcast/Taiwan pr. [bo4]

sentences.english: The farmer is planted grain enthusiasm rises, situation of production of spring ploughing spring sowing is better.
sentences.chinese: 农民种粮积极性提高，春耕春播生产形势较好。

sentences.english: The spring-sowing time has set in.
Its time to start spring sewing.
The time from the germination to commodity is 56 days.
sentences.chinese: 春播从播种到商品采摘期为56天。

sentences.english: It is already time to start spring sowing .
sentences.chinese: 现在已经是开始春播的时候了。

sentences.english: It is already time to start spring sowing.
The variety was suitable for sowing in spring in north of Xinjiang.
sentences.chinese: 该品种适宜新疆北部冷凉大豆产区春播。

definition: sowing in autumn (for a crop in spring)
to plow a field in the spring
early season rice/rice at transplanting or still unripe
to make preparations for plowing and sowing
(of plants) to turn green again/to revegetate
the state of moisture in the soil (and whether it can support a crop)
to plant early/to sow seeds in early spring/early sowing
to sprout/to come out (of seedling)/to bud
